DOC.brief_summary: This open label , single arm study assess safety efficacy RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) patient moderate severe active rheumatoid arthritis inadequate response disease-modifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARDs ) . Patients receive RoActemra/Actemra dose 8 mg/kg intravenously every 4 week 24 week ( 6 infusion ) .
